owner.description: Owner of the space. If null, the requester will be the owner

appHolder.description: App Id. If null, the app holder from current token will be used
App Id. If null, the app holder from current token will be used

customerIdentificationCode.description: This is an internal user id. It can be used to give a custom Id to this access point for identification inside a building etc.

accessPointCreationPermissionOptions.description: If not defined, No access will be granted by default
